thread.title: Vox Writer Says Oscar Awards Should Be Cancelled To Protest Trump’s Policies
thread.title_full: Vox Writer Says Oscar Awards Should Be Cancelled To Protest Trump’s Policies

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Vox Writer Says Oscar Awards Should Be Cancelled To Protest Trump’s Policies

organizations.name: academy of motion picture arts and sciences

text:
Do you like this article? 
Liberals are really having a hard time with this whole Donald Trump thing. 
That was predictable but at the same time, I’m not sure everyone anticipated just how unhinged they would become. 
Apparently, a writer at Vox came up with a new way to “stick it” to Donald Trump. 
As you can imagine, it won’t actually move the needle against Trump at all. 
The great Ed Morrissey has the details… 
From Hot Air : 
Finally — a proposal that will unite Americans across the political spectrum . Vox’s Todd VanDerWerff writes today that Hollywood should cancel its upcoming Oscars broadcast if it wants to put teeth into its opposition to Donald Trump and his policies: 
President Donald Trump’s new immigration order — the one many have labeled a “Muslim ban” because it temporarily bars entry to the US for natives of seven Muslim-majority countries — stops people associated with various Oscar-nominated films from attending the 2017 Academy Awards . That’s just one reason the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences should cancel its annual ceremony and instead announce the winners via press release. 
Yeah, that’ll show Trump. 
Cancel the biggest liberal pat on the back fest ever. 
The only one hurt by canceling the Oscars would be the out of touch celebrities. 
In theory, extending the Oscars would hurt Trump more than canceling them would. 
Did you catch the SAG Awards the other day? My lord. I’ve never seen a more embarrassing performance in my life outside of Hillary’s 2016 campaign and Meryl Streep’s meltdown . 
But hey, go ahead. Cancel them. 
See what happens. 
Also, let’s not forget that Trump’s recent immigration order was completely reasonable . LIKE this article?
